Reviews.Title: Nice notebook except the 2 I have the screen shattered from a very minor bump
Reviews.Author: Mary J. Seitz "complex"
Reviews.Content: I really love this notebook.  It is sleek looking.  It has great sound for a notebook.  The keyboard is a bit different - the keys are surrounded by the metal insert.  So took a little time to get used to but now I like the touch and feel of them.  And it's loaded with features - see review of same notebook from a different vendor at http://www.amazon.com/Acer-Aspire-TimelineX-AS4830TG-6808-14-inch/dp/B006ITEB34/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid;=1356118147&sr;=8-2&keywords;=Acer+14%22+Aspire+Laptop+4GB+500GB+%7C+AS4830T-6682March 3, 2013I have 2 of these notebooks.  For both, the screen shattered with little contact.  I bought the second one because I live the notebook as a whole.  But the screen shattered while it was on the floor and not bumped.  The cover containing the screen is thin and can be twisted it is so thin (I tried to twist the first one after it shattered.

Reviews.Title: Great little machine. Does everything.
Reviews.Author: Cameron
Reviews.Content: This little laptop does everything I need. I also purchased a 17" Acer laptop with a lot more computing power, but I end up using the 14" most of the time because it gives me great quality computing. I now generally use the 17" just to stream movies.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Pravin Sharma
Reviews.Content: Loved the deal and the price was exceptionally great. The product was refurbished but i dont have any problem so far!!!
